cleaned_text: Energy balance Energy balance may refer to: [Earth's energy balance](/wiki/Earth%27s_energy_balance), the relationship between incoming solar radiation, outgoing radiation of all types, and global temperature change. [Energy accounting](/wiki/Energy_accounting), a system used within industry, where measuring and analyzing the energy consumption of different activities is done to improve energy efficiency [Energy balance (biology)](/wiki/Energy_balance_(biology)), a measurement of the biological homeostasis of energy in living systems [Energy balance (energy economics)](/wiki/Energy_balance_(energy_economics)), verification and analysis of emergence, transformation and use of energy sources within an economic zone [Energy economics](/wiki/Energy_economics), where the energy balance of a country is an aggregate presentation of all human activities related to energy, except for natural and biological processes [Energy Economics (journal)](/wiki/Energy_Economics_(journal)), a scientific journal published by Elsevier under its "North Holland" imprint [Energy returned on energy invested](/wiki/Energy_returned_on_energy_invested)(EROEI), ratio of the amount of usable energy acquired from a particular energy resource to the amount of energy expended to obtain that energy resource [First law of thermodynamics](/wiki/First_law_of_thermodynamics), according to which energy cannot be created or destroyed, only modified in form [Groundwater energy balance](/wiki/Groundwater_energy_balance), comparing a groundwater body in terms of incoming hydraulic energy associated with groundwater inflow and outflow See also[ [edit](/w/index.php?title=Energy_balance&action=edit§ion=1)] - Balance energy, a closetoreal time [ancillary service](/wiki/Ancillary_services_(electric_power))to [power flows](/wiki/Power-flow_study)and managed by the incumbent [transmission system operator](/wiki/Transmission_system_operator)or similar entity
